Please audit this PersonaSheet. It mixes inline styles and doesn't adapt to tablets.```tsx
export const PersonaSheet = ({ persona, onClose }) => (
  <Modal visible onRequestClose={onClose}>
    <View style={{ flex: 1, backgroundColor: '#060a12', padding: 24 }}>
      <Text style={{ color: 'white', fontSize: 28 }}>{persona.name}</Text>
      <Text style={{ color: '#9fb3d2', marginTop: 8 }}>{persona.description}</Text>
      <Image source={{ uri: persona.hero }} style={{ width: '100%', height: 240, borderRadius: 24, marginTop: 24 }} />
      <Pressable onPress={onClose} style={{ marginTop: 32, padding: 16, backgroundColor: '#4c8fff', borderRadius: 16 }}>
        <Text style={{ color: 'white', textAlign: 'center' }}>Close</Text>
      </Pressable>
    </View>
  </Modal>
);
```
